contentrichtext.text: {{refimprove|date=January 2013}} {{Infobox Belgium Municipality |name=Zulte |picture= |picture-legend= |map=GemZulteLocation.png |map-legend=Location of Zulte in East Flanders |arms=Schildzulte.png |flag=Flag of Zulte.svg |region={{BE-REG-FLE}} |community={{BE-NL}} |province={{BE-PROV-OV}} |arrondissement=[[Arrondissement of Ghent|Ghent]] |nis=44081 |pyramid-date= |0-19= |20-64= |65= |foreigners= |foreigners-date= |mayor=Henk Heyerick |majority=[[Christen-Democratisch en Vlaams|CD&V]] |postal-codes=9870 |telephone-area=09 |web=[http://www.zulte.be/ www.zulte.be] |lat_deg=50 |lat_min=55 |lon_deg=03 |lon_min=26 }} '''Zulte''' is a [[Belgium|Belgian]] [[municipality]] located in [[Flemish Region|Flanders]] and in the [[Flanders|Flemish]] province of [[East Flanders]]. The municipality comprises the towns of [[Machelen (Zulte)|Machelen]], [[Olsene]] and Zulte proper. On January 1, 2006 Zulte had a total population of 14,611. The total area is 32.52 km² which gives a [[population density]] of 449 inhabitants per km². The town used to have its own beer since 1891 (simply called Zulte) but today they are part of [[Alken-Maes]] breweries. The main [[football club]] from Zulte merged with [[K.S.V. Waregem|KSV Waregem]] to form a team called [[S.V. Zulte Waregem|SV Zulte Waregem]] that plays in the [[Belgian Pro League]] as of 2006. ==Famous inhabitants== *[[Roger Raveel]], painter *[[Gerard Reve]], Dutch writer ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== *{{nl icon}} [http://www.zulte.be Official website] {{East_Flanders}} [[Category:Municipalities of East Flanders]] {{EastFlanders-geo-stub}}
